meanings.definition: Not chosen by vote or election.
meanings.sent1: The nonelective committee was appointed by the principal.
meanings.sent2: Attending the nonelective meeting was mandatory for all employees.
meanings.sent3: The nonelective task of cleaning the bathroom fell to the new intern.
meanings.sent4: The nonelective duty of taking out the trash weighed heavily on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The nonelective decision to cancel the event left everyone disappointed.

meanings.sent1: The nonelective overtime work was exhausting for the employees.
meanings.sent2: Wearing a helmet while biking is nonelective for safety reasons.
meanings.sent3: The nonelective assignment of eating broccoli made the child pout.
meanings.sent4: The nonelective responsibility of caring for the plants taught her patience.
meanings.sent5: The nonelective requirement to wear a uniform made everyone look the same.
